biotools.summary: The FPM app is an open-source application for simple and intuitive Fourier ptychographic reconstruction. FPM is a computational microscopy technique that allows obtaining microscopic image of a measured sample with much higher resolution than it would follow from the numerical aperture (NA) of used microscope objective.
